meanings.definition: Having a pleasant taste or flavor.
meanings.sent2: The cake was so flavorous that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent3: The flavorous ice cream made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as flavorous as a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the flavorous coffee filled the room.

meanings.sent2: The curry was so flavorous that it became everyone's favorite dish.
meanings.sent3: The flavorous popcorn made the movie even better.
meanings.sent4: His words were as flavorous as a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent5: The flavorous fruits burst with sweetness in every bite.
